00038 /* GGX */
00039 
00040 typedef struct BsdfMicrofacetGGXClosure {
00041     //float3 m_N;
00042     float m_ag;
00043     float m_eta;
00044 } BsdfMicrofacetGGXClosure;
00045 
00046 __device_inline float safe_sqrtf(float f)
00047 {
00048     return sqrtf(max(f, 0.0f));
00049 }
00050 
00051 __device void bsdf_microfacet_ggx_setup(ShaderData *sd, ShaderClosure *sc, float ag, float eta, bool refractive)
00052 {
00053     float m_ag = clamp(ag, 1e-4f, 1.0f);
00054     float m_eta = eta;
00055 
00056     sc->data0 = m_ag;
00057     sc->data1 = m_eta;
00058 
00059     if(refractive)
00060         sc->type = CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_GGX_REFRACTION_ID;
00061     else
00062         sc->type = CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_GGX_ID;
00063 
00064     sd->flag |= SD_BSDF|SD_BSDF_HAS_EVAL|SD_BSDF_GLOSSY;
00065 }
00066 
00067 __device void bsdf_microfacet_ggx_blur(ShaderClosure *sc, float roughness)
00068 {
00069     float m_ag = sc->data0;
00070     m_ag = fmaxf(roughness, m_ag);
00071     sc->data0 = m_ag;
00072 }
00073 
00074 __device float3 bsdf_microfacet_ggx_eval_reflect(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I, const float3 omega_in, float *pdf)
00075 {
00076     float m_ag = sc->data0;
00077     //float m_eta = sc->data1;
00078     int m_refractive = sc->type == CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_GGX_REFRACTION_ID;
00079     float3 m_N = sd->N;
00080 
00081     if(m_refractive) return make_float3 (0, 0, 0);
00082     float cosNO = dot(m_N, I);
00083     float cosNI = dot(m_N, omega_in);
00084     if(cosNI > 0 && cosNO > 0) {
00085         // get half vector
00086         float3 Hr = normalize(omega_in + I);
00087         // eq. 20: (F*G*D)/(4*in*on)
00088         // eq. 33: first we calculate D(m) with m=Hr:
00089         float alpha2 = m_ag * m_ag;
00090         float cosThetaM = dot(m_N, Hr);
00091         float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00092         float tanThetaM2 = (1 - cosThetaM2) / cosThetaM2;
00093         float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00094         float D = alpha2 / (M_PI_F * cosThetaM4 * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2) * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2));
00095         // eq. 34: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00096         float G1o = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00097         float G1i = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI))); 
00098         float G = G1o * G1i;
00099         float out = (G * D) * 0.25f / cosNO;
00100         // eq. 24
00101         float pm = D * cosThetaM;
00102         // convert into pdf of the sampled direction
00103         // eq. 38 - but see also:
00104         // eq. 17 in http://www.graphics.cornell.edu/~bjw/wardnotes.pdf
00105         *pdf = pm * 0.25f / dot(Hr, I);
00106         return make_float3 (out, out, out);
00107     }
00108     return make_float3 (0, 0, 0);
00109 }
00110 
00111 __device float3 bsdf_microfacet_ggx_eval_transmit(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I, const float3 omega_in, float *pdf)
00112 {
00113     float m_ag = sc->data0;
00114     float m_eta = sc->data1;
00115     int m_refractive = sc->type == CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_GGX_REFRACTION_ID;
00116     float3 m_N = sd->N;
00117 
00118     if(!m_refractive) return make_float3 (0, 0, 0);
00119     float cosNO = dot(m_N, I);
00120     float cosNI = dot(m_N, omega_in);
00121     if(cosNO <= 0 || cosNI >= 0)
00122         return make_float3 (0, 0, 0); // vectors on same side -- not possible
00123     // compute half-vector of the refraction (eq. 16)
00124     float3 ht = -(m_eta * omega_in + I);
00125     float3 Ht = normalize(ht);
00126     float cosHO = dot(Ht, I);
00127 
00128     float cosHI = dot(Ht, omega_in);
00129     // eq. 33: first we calculate D(m) with m=Ht:
00130     float alpha2 = m_ag * m_ag;
00131     float cosThetaM = dot(m_N, Ht);
00132     float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00133     float tanThetaM2 = (1 - cosThetaM2) / cosThetaM2;
00134     float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00135     float D = alpha2 / (M_PI_F * cosThetaM4 * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2) * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2));
00136     // eq. 34: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00137     float G1o = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00138     float G1i = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI))); 
00139     float G = G1o * G1i;
00140     // probability
00141     float invHt2 = 1 / dot(ht, ht);
00142     *pdf = D * fabsf(cosThetaM) * (fabsf(cosHI) * (m_eta * m_eta)) * invHt2;
00143     float out = (fabsf(cosHI * cosHO) * (m_eta * m_eta) * (G * D) * invHt2) / cosNO;
00144     return make_float3 (out, out, out);
00145 }
00146 
00147 __device float bsdf_microfacet_ggx_albedo(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I)
00148 {
00149     return 1.0f;
00150 }
00151 
00152 __device int bsdf_microfacet_ggx_sample(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, float randu, float randv, float3 *eval, float3 *omega_in, float3 *domega_in_dx, float3 *domega_in_dy, float *pdf)
00153 {
00154     float m_ag = sc->data0;
00155     float m_eta = sc->data1;
00156     int m_refractive = sc->type == CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_GGX_REFRACTION_ID;
00157     float3 m_N = sd->N;
00158 
00159     float cosNO = dot(m_N, sd->I);
00160     if(cosNO > 0) {
00161         float3 X, Y, Z = m_N;
00162         make_orthonormals(Z, &X, &Y);
00163         // generate a random microfacet normal m
00164         // eq. 35,36:
00165         // we take advantage of cos(atan(x)) == 1/sqrt(1+x^2)
00166         //tttt  and sin(atan(x)) == x/sqrt(1+x^2)
00167         float alpha2 = m_ag * m_ag;
00168         float tanThetaM2 = alpha2 * randu / (1 - randu);
00169         float cosThetaM  = 1 / safe_sqrtf(1 + tanThetaM2);
00170         float sinThetaM  = cosThetaM * safe_sqrtf(tanThetaM2);
00171         float phiM = 2 * M_PI_F * randv;
00172         float3 m = (cosf(phiM) * sinThetaM) * X +
00173                  (sinf(phiM) * sinThetaM) * Y +
00174                                cosThetaM  * Z;
00175         if(!m_refractive) {
00176             float cosMO = dot(m, sd->I);
00177             if(cosMO > 0) {
00178                 // eq. 39 - compute actual reflected direction
00179                 *omega_in = 2 * cosMO * m - sd->I;
00180                 if(dot(sd->Ng, *omega_in) > 0) {
00181                     // microfacet normal is visible to this ray
00182                     // eq. 33
00183                     float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00184                     float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00185                     float D = alpha2 / (M_PI_F * cosThetaM4 * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2) * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2));
00186                     // eq. 24
00187                     float pm = D * cosThetaM;
00188                     // convert into pdf of the sampled direction
00189                     // eq. 38 - but see also:
00190                     // eq. 17 in http://www.graphics.cornell.edu/~bjw/wardnotes.pdf
00191                     *pdf = pm * 0.25f / cosMO;
00192                     // eval BRDF*cosNI
00193                     float cosNI = dot(m_N, *omega_in);
00194                     // eq. 34: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00195                     float G1o = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00196                     float G1i = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI))); 
00197                     float G = G1o * G1i;
00198                     // eq. 20: (F*G*D)/(4*in*on)
00199                     float out = (G * D) * 0.25f / cosNO;
00200                     *eval = make_float3(out, out, out);
00201 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00202                     *domega_in_dx = (2 * dot(m, sd->dI.dx)) * m - sd->dI.dx;
00203                     *domega_in_dy = (2 * dot(m, sd->dI.dy)) * m - sd->dI.dy;
00204                     // Since there is some blur to this reflection, make the
00205                     // derivatives a bit bigger. In theory this varies with the
00206                     // roughness but the exact relationship is complex and
00207                     // requires more ops than are practical.
00208                     *domega_in_dx *= 10.0f;
00209                     *domega_in_dy *= 10.0f;
00210 #endif
00211                 }
00212             }
00213         } else {
00214             // CAUTION: the i and o variables are inverted relative to the paper
00215             // eq. 39 - compute actual refractive direction
00216             float3 R, T;
00217 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00218             float3 dRdx, dRdy, dTdx, dTdy;
00219 #endif
00220             bool inside;
00221             fresnel_dielectric(m_eta, m, sd->I, &R, &T,
00222 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00223                 sd->dI.dx, sd->dI.dy, &dRdx, &dRdy, &dTdx, &dTdy,
00224 #endif
00225                 &inside);
00226             
00227             if(!inside) {
00228                 *omega_in = T;
00229 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00230                 *domega_in_dx = dTdx;
00231                 *domega_in_dy = dTdy;
00232 #endif
00233                 // eq. 33
00234                 float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00235                 float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00236                 float D = alpha2 / (M_PI_F * cosThetaM4 * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2) * (alpha2 + tanThetaM2));
00237                 // eq. 24
00238                 float pm = D * cosThetaM;
00239                 // eval BRDF*cosNI
00240                 float cosNI = dot(m_N, *omega_in);
00241                 // eq. 34: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00242                 float G1o = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00243                 float G1i = 2 / (1 + safe_sqrtf(1 + alpha2 * (1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI))); 
00244                 float G = G1o * G1i;
00245                 // eq. 21
00246                 float cosHI = dot(m, *omega_in);
00247                 float cosHO = dot(m, sd->I);
00248                 float Ht2 = m_eta * cosHI + cosHO;
00249                 Ht2 *= Ht2;
00250                 float out = (fabsf(cosHI * cosHO) * (m_eta * m_eta) * (G * D)) / (cosNO * Ht2);
00251                 // eq. 38 and eq. 17
00252                 *pdf = pm * (m_eta * m_eta) * fabsf(cosHI) / Ht2;
00253                 *eval = make_float3(out, out, out);
00254 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00255                 // Since there is some blur to this refraction, make the
00256                 // derivatives a bit bigger. In theory this varies with the
00257                 // roughness but the exact relationship is complex and
00258                 // requires more ops than are practical.
00259                 *domega_in_dx *= 10.0f;
00260                 *domega_in_dy *= 10.0f;
00261 #endif
00262             }
00263         }
00264     }
00265     return (m_refractive) ? LABEL_TRANSMIT|LABEL_GLOSSY : LABEL_REFLECT|LABEL_GLOSSY;
00266 }

00268 /* BECKMANN */
00269 
00270 typedef struct BsdfMicrofacetBeckmannClosure {
00271     //float3 m_N;
00272     float m_ab;
00273     float m_eta;
00274 } BsdfMicrofacetBeckmannClosure;
00275 
00276 __device void bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_setup(ShaderData *sd, ShaderClosure *sc, float ab, float eta, bool refractive)
00277 {
00278     float m_ab = clamp(ab, 1e-4f, 1.0f);
00279     float m_eta = eta;
00280 
00281     sc->data0 = m_ab;
00282     sc->data1 = m_eta;
00283 
00284     if(refractive)
00285         sc->type = CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_BECKMANN_REFRACTION_ID;
00286     else
00287         sc->type = CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_BECKMANN_ID;
00288 
00289     sd->flag |= SD_BSDF|SD_BSDF_HAS_EVAL|SD_BSDF_GLOSSY;
00290 }
00291 
00292 __device void bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_blur(ShaderClosure *sc, float roughness)
00293 {
00294     float m_ab = sc->data0;
00295     m_ab = fmaxf(roughness, m_ab);
00296     sc->data0 = m_ab;
00297 }
00298 
00299 __device float3 bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_eval_reflect(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I, const float3 omega_in, float *pdf)
00300 {
00301     float m_ab = sc->data0;
00302     //float m_eta = sc->data1;
00303     int m_refractive = sc->type == CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_BECKMANN_REFRACTION_ID;
00304     float3 m_N = sd->N;
00305 
00306     if(m_refractive) return make_float3 (0, 0, 0);
00307     float cosNO = dot(m_N, I);
00308     float cosNI = dot(m_N, omega_in);
00309     if(cosNO > 0 && cosNI > 0) {
00310        // get half vector
00311        float3 Hr = normalize(omega_in + I);
00312        // eq. 20: (F*G*D)/(4*in*on)
00313        // eq. 25: first we calculate D(m) with m=Hr:
00314        float alpha2 = m_ab * m_ab;
00315        float cosThetaM = dot(m_N, Hr);
00316        float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00317        float tanThetaM2 = (1 - cosThetaM2) / cosThetaM2;
00318        float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00319        float D = expf(-tanThetaM2 / alpha2) / (M_PI_F * alpha2 *  cosThetaM4);
00320        // eq. 26, 27: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00321        float ao = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00322        float ai = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI)));
00323        float G1o = ao < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ao + 2.181f * ao * ao) / (1 + 2.276f * ao + 2.577f * ao * ao) : 1.0f;
00324        float G1i = ai < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ai + 2.181f * ai * ai) / (1 + 2.276f * ai + 2.577f * ai * ai) : 1.0f;
00325        float G = G1o * G1i;
00326        float out = (G * D) * 0.25f / cosNO;
00327        // eq. 24
00328        float pm = D * cosThetaM;
00329        // convert into pdf of the sampled direction
00330        // eq. 38 - but see also:
00331        // eq. 17 in http://www.graphics.cornell.edu/~bjw/wardnotes.pdf
00332        *pdf = pm * 0.25f / dot(Hr, I);
00333        return make_float3 (out, out, out);
00334     }
00335     return make_float3 (0, 0, 0);
00336 }
00337 
00338 __device float3 bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_eval_transmit(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I, const float3 omega_in, float *pdf)
00339 {
00340     float m_ab = sc->data0;
00341     float m_eta = sc->data1;
00342     int m_refractive = sc->type == CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_BECKMANN_REFRACTION_ID;
00343     float3 m_N = sd->N;
00344 
00345     if(!m_refractive) return make_float3 (0, 0, 0);
00346     float cosNO = dot(m_N, I);
00347     float cosNI = dot(m_N, omega_in);
00348     if(cosNO <= 0 || cosNI >= 0)
00349         return make_float3 (0, 0, 0);
00350     // compute half-vector of the refraction (eq. 16)
00351     float3 ht = -(m_eta * omega_in + I);
00352     float3 Ht = normalize(ht);
00353     float cosHO = dot(Ht, I);
00354 
00355     float cosHI = dot(Ht, omega_in);
00356     // eq. 33: first we calculate D(m) with m=Ht:
00357     float alpha2 = m_ab * m_ab;
00358     float cosThetaM = dot(m_N, Ht);
00359     float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00360     float tanThetaM2 = (1 - cosThetaM2) / cosThetaM2;
00361     float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00362     float D = expf(-tanThetaM2 / alpha2) / (M_PI_F * alpha2 *  cosThetaM4);
00363     // eq. 26, 27: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00364     float ao = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00365     float ai = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI)));
00366     float G1o = ao < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ao + 2.181f * ao * ao) / (1 + 2.276f * ao + 2.577f * ao * ao) : 1.0f;
00367     float G1i = ai < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ai + 2.181f * ai * ai) / (1 + 2.276f * ai + 2.577f * ai * ai) : 1.0f;
00368     float G = G1o * G1i;
00369     // probability
00370     float invHt2 = 1 / dot(ht, ht);
00371     *pdf = D * fabsf(cosThetaM) * (fabsf(cosHI) * (m_eta * m_eta)) * invHt2;
00372     float out = (fabsf(cosHI * cosHO) * (m_eta * m_eta) * (G * D) * invHt2) / cosNO;
00373     return make_float3 (out, out, out);
00374 }

00376 __device float bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_albedo(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I)
00377 {
00378     return 1.0f;
00379 }

00381 __device int bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_sample(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, float randu, float randv, float3 *eval, float3 *omega_in, float3 *domega_in_dx, float3 *domega_in_dy, float *pdf)
00382 {
00383     float m_ab = sc->data0;
00384     float m_eta = sc->data1;
00385     int m_refractive = sc->type == CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_BECKMANN_REFRACTION_ID;
00386     float3 m_N = sd->N;
00387 
00388     float cosNO = dot(m_N, sd->I);
00389     if(cosNO > 0) {
00390         float3 X, Y, Z = m_N;
00391         make_orthonormals(Z, &X, &Y);
00392         // generate a random microfacet normal m
00393         // eq. 35,36:
00394         // we take advantage of cos(atan(x)) == 1/sqrt(1+x^2)
00395         //tttt  and sin(atan(x)) == x/sqrt(1+x^2)
00396         float alpha2 = m_ab * m_ab;
00397         float tanThetaM = safe_sqrtf(-alpha2 * logf(1 - randu));
00398         float cosThetaM = 1 / safe_sqrtf(1 + tanThetaM * tanThetaM);
00399         float sinThetaM = cosThetaM * tanThetaM;
00400         float phiM = 2 * M_PI_F * randv;
00401         float3 m = (cosf(phiM) * sinThetaM) * X +
00402                  (sinf(phiM) * sinThetaM) * Y +
00403                                cosThetaM  * Z;
00404 
00405         if(!m_refractive) {
00406             float cosMO = dot(m, sd->I);
00407             if(cosMO > 0) {
00408                 // eq. 39 - compute actual reflected direction
00409                 *omega_in = 2 * cosMO * m - sd->I;
00410                 if(dot(sd->Ng, *omega_in) > 0) {
00411                     // microfacet normal is visible to this ray
00412                     // eq. 25
00413                     float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00414                     float tanThetaM2 = tanThetaM * tanThetaM;
00415                     float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00416                     float D = expf(-tanThetaM2 / alpha2) / (M_PI_F * alpha2 *  cosThetaM4);
00417                     // eq. 24
00418                     float pm = D * cosThetaM;
00419                     // convert into pdf of the sampled direction
00420                     // eq. 38 - but see also:
00421                     // eq. 17 in http://www.graphics.cornell.edu/~bjw/wardnotes.pdf
00422                     *pdf = pm * 0.25f / cosMO;
00423                     // Eval BRDF*cosNI
00424                     float cosNI = dot(m_N, *omega_in);
00425                     // eq. 26, 27: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00426                     float ao = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00427                     float ai = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI)));
00428                     float G1o = ao < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ao + 2.181f * ao * ao) / (1 + 2.276f * ao + 2.577f * ao * ao) : 1.0f;
00429                     float G1i = ai < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ai + 2.181f * ai * ai) / (1 + 2.276f * ai + 2.577f * ai * ai) : 1.0f;
00430                     float G = G1o * G1i;
00431                     // eq. 20: (F*G*D)/(4*in*on)
00432                     float out = (G * D) * 0.25f / cosNO;
00433                     *eval = make_float3(out, out, out);
00434 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00435                     *domega_in_dx = (2 * dot(m, sd->dI.dx)) * m - sd->dI.dx;
00436                     *domega_in_dy = (2 * dot(m, sd->dI.dy)) * m - sd->dI.dy;
00437                     // Since there is some blur to this reflection, make the
00438                     // derivatives a bit bigger. In theory this varies with the
00439                     // roughness but the exact relationship is complex and
00440                     // requires more ops than are practical.
00441                     *domega_in_dx *= 10.0f;
00442                     *domega_in_dy *= 10.0f;
00443 #endif
00444                 }
00445             }
00446         } else {
00447             // CAUTION: the i and o variables are inverted relative to the paper
00448             // eq. 39 - compute actual refractive direction
00449             float3 R, T;
00450 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00451             float3 dRdx, dRdy, dTdx, dTdy;
00452 #endif
00453             bool inside;
00454             fresnel_dielectric(m_eta, m, sd->I, &R, &T,
00455 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00456                 sd->dI.dx, sd->dI.dy, &dRdx, &dRdy, &dTdx, &dTdy,
00457 #endif
00458                 &inside);
00459 
00460             if(!inside) {
00461                 *omega_in = T;
00462 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00463                 *domega_in_dx = dTdx;
00464                 *domega_in_dy = dTdy;
00465 #endif
00466 
00467                 // eq. 33
00468                 float cosThetaM2 = cosThetaM * cosThetaM;
00469                 float tanThetaM2 = tanThetaM * tanThetaM;
00470                 float cosThetaM4 = cosThetaM2 * cosThetaM2;
00471                 float D = expf(-tanThetaM2 / alpha2) / (M_PI_F * alpha2 *  cosThetaM4);
00472                 // eq. 24
00473                 float pm = D * cosThetaM;
00474                 // eval BRDF*cosNI
00475                 float cosNI = dot(m_N, *omega_in);
00476                 // eq. 26, 27: now calculate G1(i,m) and G1(o,m)
00477                 float ao = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNO * cosNO) / (cosNO * cosNO)));
00478                 float ai = 1 / (m_ab * safe_sqrtf((1 - cosNI * cosNI) / (cosNI * cosNI)));
00479                 float G1o = ao < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ao + 2.181f * ao * ao) / (1 + 2.276f * ao + 2.577f * ao * ao) : 1.0f;
00480                 float G1i = ai < 1.6f ? (3.535f * ai + 2.181f * ai * ai) / (1 + 2.276f * ai + 2.577f * ai * ai) : 1.0f;
00481                 float G = G1o * G1i;
00482                 // eq. 21
00483                 float cosHI = dot(m, *omega_in);
00484                 float cosHO = dot(m, sd->I);
00485                 float Ht2 = m_eta * cosHI + cosHO;
00486                 Ht2 *= Ht2;
00487                 float out = (fabsf(cosHI * cosHO) * (m_eta * m_eta) * (G * D)) / (cosNO * Ht2);
00488                 // eq. 38 and eq. 17
00489                 *pdf = pm * (m_eta * m_eta) * fabsf(cosHI) / Ht2;
00490                 *eval = make_float3(out, out, out);
00491 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00492                 // Since there is some blur to this refraction, make the
00493                 // derivatives a bit bigger. In theory this varies with the
00494                 // roughness but the exact relationship is complex and
00495                 // requires more ops than are practical.
00496                 *domega_in_dx *= 10.0f;
00497                 *domega_in_dy *= 10.0f;
00498 #endif
00499             }
00500         }
00501     }
00502     return (m_refractive) ? LABEL_TRANSMIT|LABEL_GLOSSY : LABEL_REFLECT|LABEL_GLOSSY;
00503 }
00504 
00505 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
00506 
00507 #endif /* __BSDF_MICROFACET_H__ */
